metadata.synopsis: Gone to California without a passport, Dracula (Francis Lederer) poses as an artist and moves in with a family.

reviews: A Cold War horror movie in which vampirism functions as a metaphor for Communism and the forces of anti-Christianity, with Dracula a shadow version of Jesus who performs miracles (he restores a blind girl's sight) and promises immortality...
A satisfying low-budget schlock horror flick that has Dracula searching to rebuild his army of the undead in the New World.
